name: Zombie Dungeon (itch) (Sugartitty)
description:
Controls

  • WASD - Walk up/left/down/right
  • R - Reload
  • LMB - Shoot/use menu
  • ALT+F4 - Exit game

Credit

I used these two assets, everything else is original
Zombie Cartoon | 3D Humanoids | Unity Asset Store
New Dungeon Pack Modular Low Poly (Free Version) | 3D Dungeons | Unity Asset Store

I recorded all sounds myself and wrote the game logic with help from Stack Overflow and YouTube ;)
